Rule.Name: EmptyAssemblyRule: The prose name of the rule goes here.
Rule.Description: EmptyAssemblyRule: The short description goes here.
Rule.LongDescription: EmptyAssemblyRule: The long description goes here.
Rule.GroupOwner: EmptyAssemblyRule: This is optional, but is generally the developer/team/company.
Rule.DevOwner: EmptyAssemblyRule: The team or individual responsible for the rule.
Rule.Owner: The Owner: Optional - can be empty string
Rule.Url: EmptyAssemblyRule: The URL for help containing the rule.
Rule.Resolution: EmptyAssemblyRule: The string that appears in the message panel pointing out the error.
Rule.Email: EmptyAssemblyRule: The optional email address of the rule author.

Rule.Name: Namespaces should begin with the company name 'FooBar'
Rule.Description: All Namespaces should be named {Company}.{Application}.{Feature}.{SubFeature} eg. FooBar.Calulator.UI
Rule.Resolution: Alter the namespace '{0}' so that 'FooBar' is the first component.
